Package ohos.agp.components

Interface ComponentParent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptiveBoxLayout, ComponentContainer, DatePicker, DependentLayout, DirectionalLayout, ListContainer, MagicLayout, NestedScrollCoordinator, NestedScrollView, PageFlipper, PageSlider, Picker, PositionLayout, RadioContainer, ScrollView, SearchBar, SlideDrawer, StackLayout, TableLayout, TabList, TimePicker

    public interface ComponentParent
    Defines features of a parent component.

    This class provides interfaces for a component to interact with its parent component.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getChildIndex​(Component component)
      Queries the position of a child component.
      ComponentParent getComponentParent​()
      Obtains the parent component of a child component.
      void moveChildToFront​(Component component)
      Adjusts the z-order of a child component to top the component over all child components.
      boolean onDrag​(Component component, DragEvent event)
      Checks if a drag event is distributed to the parent component.
      void postLayout​()
      Requests the parent component to rearrange its layout.
      void removeComponent​(Component component)
      Removes a child component from the parent component.
      void removeComponentAt​(int index)
      Removes the component from a specified position in the component list.
      void removeComponents​(int start, int count)
      Removes all components from specified positions in a component list.
      ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig verifyLayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig config)
      Verifies layout parameters based on the current layout type.

    • Method Detail

      • postLayout

        void postLayout​()
        Requests the parent component to rearrange its layout.
        Since:
        4

      • getChildIndex

        int getChildIndex​(Component component)
        Queries the position of a child component.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the child component to query.
        Returns:
        Returns a positive integer, which represents the position of the child component in the parent component; returns -1 if the child component is not included in the parent component.
        Since:
        4

      • removeComponent

        void removeComponent​(Component component)
        Removes a child component from the parent component.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the child component to remove.

      • removeComponentAt

        void removeComponentAt​(int index)
        Removes the component from a specified position in the component list.
        Parameters:
        index - Indicates the position index of the component to remove.

      • removeComponents

        void removeComponents​(int start,
                      int count)
        Removes all components from specified positions in a component list.
        Parameters:
        start - Indicates the position index of the first removed component.
        count - Indicates the quantity of components to remove.

      • verifyLayoutConfig

        ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig verifyLayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig config)
        Verifies layout parameters based on the current layout type.
        Parameters:
        config - Indicates a group of layout parameters to be converted into a ComponentContainer instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the LayoutConfig instance, which represents the layout parameters.

      • getComponentParent

        ComponentParent getComponentParent​()
        Obtains the parent component of a child component.
        Returns:
        Returns the parent component of the child component.

      • moveChildToFront

        void moveChildToFront​(Component component)
        Adjusts the z-order of a child component to top the component over all child components.

        An order-dependent layout is changed by the z-order adjustment.

        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the child component to be moved on the top of all child components.
        Since:
        4

      • onDrag

        boolean onDrag​(Component component,
               DragEvent event)
        Checks if a drag event is distributed to the parent component.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component that receives the drag event.
        event - Indicates the DragEvent object.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the drag event has been processed by the parent component; returns false otherwise.
